cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP address to an unreachable IP '10.0.0.1' will cause SCTP connection failure and prevent F1 interface establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the absolute SSB frequency to 0 (out of range) will cause frequency misalignment and lead to SSB transmission failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將絕對 SSB 頻率設定為 0（超出範圍）會導致頻率錯位，並造成 SSB 傳輸失敗。
